short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NotePad with markdown support  all websites in the devtools panel .

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NoteIt extension is used to create notes from any website, once the note is created you can see notes on NoteIt (https://noteitwce.herokuapp.com/) website, the extension opens in devtool of chrome by doing so we ensure that view of website is not disturbed. To use the extension firstly you have to login through NoteIt website.

To access the extension you have to press Ctrl+Shift+i  and then click on NoteIt.For the first time, you have to move NoteIt to the front panel to access it easily next time.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0o9BoU_O_w&ab_channel=KshitijSabale
